title: 1980 x 1080 screen bugged
body:
After updating my windows i loaded up league as usual and went in to a normal game, but this time my screen opened up in widowed which i NEVER have on, i went to change it back to fullscreen, but i just made it borderless in my top left of my monitor. After screwing around on my game settings the biggest i can get to my original resolution is 1768 x 992. But as soon as i click 1980 x 1080. It is zoomed in, Name on my champion is not in the correct place and whenever i click somewhere it goes about 10 centimetres to the right and down 

http://callumcharlton.imgur.com/all/

 Can some one please help, i've repaired, I've deleted and re-installed league and it just wont fix

replies.body:
Your image is in a privately locked gallery, so nobody else can see it.

Do other games that allow that resolution work normally?

Your resolution in general may be too high to support the game, for example similar issues can happen with 4K screens.  I know that you recently updated Windows so there could be a settings that's been changed, and you can use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for steps to make sure all of your drivers are up to date.  Otherwise, it may be necessary to reduce your in-game and screen resolutions to the original for best performance.  Hope that helps!
